author: National Geographic
description:
Glimpse the first, rare Rockaroni penguin chicks in the wild, along with the tall Gentoo twins, the brave little Emperor, and the adaptable Galapágos babies. How will all of these cute penguin chicks learn and grow in their diverse landscapes? 

Secrets of the Penguins is now streaming on @disneyplus and @hulu  https://on.natgeo.com/4cHzyFv
